title: Rad498
author: Rad498
content: I see coins involved in pump and dumps daily on Coinbase.  You can go to top movers heading to see them.  Yesterday it was coval and today qsp is pumping.   Anyone know how to get in early on these?  Is there a Reddit sub forum?  Seems like I lose every time I jump on one of those pump and dumps (I’m too late).

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: Rad498 on August 17, 2022, 01:03:10 PMAnyone know how to get in early on these?  Is there a Reddit sub forum?LOLPump and dump communities were also popular in the bear market in 2019. I also lost $50 or $100 there, I don't remember.This is either a scam or various schemes where users like you lose money. It is better to spend your time studying the cryptocurrency market.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: That's only doing by community but remember that it can be a trap. If you wanna sure involving in such pump and dump case and then you shall prepare yourself if you are facing a huge lose. Whales and some groups were actively pumping some coins. Im not even feeling doubt about that. Remember about when GME pump was happening in the past. This scheme was a scam. The group owners have been buying more tokens. You can lose your money in a few seconds.
